data.name: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King: Chapter 2 - The Duchy of Despair
data.detailed_description:
Continue your adventure with Chapter 2 of The Accursed Crown of the Giant King, "The Duchy of Despair".

"Under a foul curse, the Duchy of Northfell has succumbed to despair and ruin. The hill giant Thane Malrold Lumber rules over the old ducal castle and much of the region, leaving the citizens of the duchy besieged in Annun City and a few other scattered sanctuaries."
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1,2GHz
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c Capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
